abstract: Anheuser-Busch has been quiet since it announced late Wednesday that Belgian rival InBev  had offered to buy the company for $65 a share, or $46.3 billion in cash, providing speculation that the brewer of Budweiser is carefully weighing its options.
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch has been quiet since it announced late Wednesday that Belgian rival InBev  had offered to buy the company for $65 a share, or $46.3 billion in cash, providing speculation that the brewer of Budweiser is carefully weighing its options.

headline.main: Anheuser-Busch Said to Face Limited Options
